de.fhb.sailboat.mission

Class PrimitiveCommandTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fhb.sailboat.mission.PrimitiveCommandTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Task

    public class PrimitiveCommandTask
extends java.lang.Object
implements Task
    Task for setting values for the actuators directly. It is finished after the values have been set.
    Author:
    hscheel

    • Constructor Detail

      • PrimitiveCommandTask

        public PrimitiveCommandTask(java.lang.Integer sail,
                    java.lang.Integer rudder,
                    java.lang.Integer propellor)
        Creates a new instance based on the values for actuators to be set. Each value can be set to null, so the current value of the related actuator is not changed.
        Parameters:
        sail - the length of the rope controlling the sail
        rudder - the position of the rudder
        propellor - the speed and direction of the propellor

        Parameters:
